overview: Chua Zi Yong, Founder and CEO â€“ Passionate about mobile applications, Zi Yong was already active in the local developer scene even before he established Stream Media Pte Ltd. He saw the potential and opportunity that lies ahead in Android, and founded â€œCodeAndroidâ€œ, the Android Developer Group for Singapore, Malaysia and Thailand in Jan 2009. As the most active developer group in this region, Zi Yong works closely with Google, Android manufacturers and other partners to promote Android-related development and launches (such as the Android Developer Lab World Tour 2010 in Singapore). He is also the Honorary Treasure of Mobile Alliance Singapore.
